ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 88
ygData.msgSnippet: ... don t think the solution is ... tenth time it spawns. Some ... sleep and other stuff in ... I ve killed bonecracker ... already shown that I can kill ...
ygData.messageBody:
>>Even if there was any anticamping areas areas which I doubt very much I
don't think the solution is
>>to make a monster spawn once every 12 hours and only have the item every
tenth time it spawns. Some
>>people that pay to play this game and want a certain object have to work,
sleep and other stuff in
>>real life and can't camp for 18 hours straight like the students. And when
I've killed bonecracker
>>11 times in a row and still don't get a whip its just plain boring. I
already shown that I can kill
>>him. Let me have my whip so I can leave and let some other person try...

This is my thoughts exactly. One other thought, the world needs to expand.
For instance, there is befallen, an excellent dungeon for level 9or10-20+.
It contains some unique items, the most notable one being the BBC. In my
experience, it takes several hours for the SK to spawn at times, or atleast
45 mins to an hour. Not very often does it carry the BBC. Me and my
friends (16-20) can take this shadowknight and everything that comes with
it. However, all that has to happen is for a high level wiz to sit there,
wait for the sk to spawn with sword in hand...hell, last night a 20
something CLERIC stole it from us..::Sigh::

Don't insult my intelligence. If I, or my group, is tough enough to take
monster x, which carries z, let the z be there, so we can leave.

Dameat
Head Lush - Drun'Ken Nation
Rodcet Nife
